title: Blues Clues: Blue's big treasure hunt
creator_credit: Traci Johnson, Angela Santomero, Todd Kessler, Wendy Harris, Viacom International and Nick Jr
brief_description: Popular young children’s television program. Encourages children to interact with Steve and follow Steve and his dog Blue on two treasure hunts. Promotes thinking skills such as problem solving and visual perception.
creator_credit_for_label: Traci Johnson, Angela Santomero, Todd Kessler, Wendy Harris, Viacom International and Nick Jr
